rows.label: tlk43300046_08_msg0002
rows.name:
Invidia is famous for its traditional
handcrafted crockery that's carved
from shells and carapaces.

rows.label: tlk43300046_08_msg0003
rows.name:
I quite like the thought of using them
to serve the food I make, in the future.

rows.label: tlk43300046_08_msg0004
rows.name:
I mean, isn't it great when the food
can boast both great taste and
presentation?

rows.label: tlk43300046_08_msg0005
rows.name:
Ah, but the dishes go up in price
along with the quality, so I don't
think they're within my range...

rows.label: tlk43300046_08_msg0006
rows.name:
So I thought, why not make them
myself? But then, even as a cook
I've got a long way to go, so...

rows.label: tlk43300046_08_msg0007
rows.name:
Seriously?
Wow, that'd be a massive help!

rows.label: tlk43300046_08_msg0008
rows.name: I hope you can make it a good one!
